location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Stephen Babbington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Th letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bombay Government dated 15 July 1811, which informed the Resident that a previous communication dated 22 May 1811 announcing the abolition of the Political Residency arose from a misinterpretation of the orders of the Supreme Government. William Bruce should therefore continue in the role of Acting Resident.
